name: Colossal Kaiju Combat: Kaijuland Battles
summary: From the folk who brought you classic Kaiju titles like "Godzilla: Save the Earth" comes the next generation of monster-on-monster fighting action! In this first release, play as any of four Kaijuland characters. 1-4 players, online or off! Future releases will feature original characters designed by our fans. To join in the discussion & submit your own character visit our forums!
